name: MemBlind
description:
A game where you need to memorize levels. You need to reach the flag to get the flag for some reason... But, also be careful, cause spiks (intentional spellin mistake go brrrrrr).

Now go, get 5 flags of very much coolness. Also, may za memory blubs be with you.

You can press the < or > in the menu to change the level thing idk

Note: levels are intensionally made harder for more screentime in the streams (only 5 levels tho)

Credits:
